title: Canada : average family size 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Average number of people has stayed the same over the Year.
Average number of people is roughly constant from 2000 to 2003, gradually decreasing from 2003 to 2004, and lastly roughly constant from 2004 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2003 and 2004.
Maximum Average number of people, about 3.0 was reported at Year 2000,  2001,  2002, and 2003
Minimum Average number of people about 2.9 was reached at Year 2004,  2005,  2006,  2007,  2008,  2009,  2010,  2011,  2012,  2013,  2014,  2015, and 2016
